about_the_game:
HIBE STUDIO is currently in Open Beta & free to use with all easy-to-use features. We aim to be the go-to software for interactive Live Streaming on TikTok and seek your feedback to improve continuously.

Step into a world where your streams are not just broadcasts but unforgettable experiences. With a suite of intuitive tools, you’ll design your streams your way:



Import your Vroid avatar or explore a highly customisable, expansive & fashionable Vtuber Avatar creation system, ready to stream in your favourite gaming environment. We further plan to introduce VRM & Live2D compatibility with the whole platform.



HIBE STUDIO is packed with a wide range of customizable visual effects, including moods, props, auras, expressions, animations, gestures, & more! These effects can be triggered using hotkeys during your live streams to celebrate milestones, engage viewers, or simply add a fun touch to your content.


Experience life-like tracking using just a webcam with advanced customisable inputs for expression tracking & calibration & audio-based lip-sync, Hand & Body Tracking will be introduced later.



HIBE STUDIO has an inbuilt library for sound effects that give your streaming moments an added interactional layer. Soon we are coming up with UGC supported sounds library to personalize user streams.



Streaming Essentials

  • HIBE STUDIO’s virtual webcam allows you to use Tiktok Live Studio, OBS, StreamLabs, or any other streaming software that supports camera input

  • Use tools like our green screen (+chroma keys) backgrounds to overlay your avatar on streams, gameplay, videos, and more

  • Through the virtual webcam, you can quickly perform virtual presentations on Zoom, Discord, Skype, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams and other software

What’s Next:

  • Automated Hot-Key Triggers for TikTok

  • Stream Overlays & Visual Effects

  • Voice Effects & Modulation

  • Game Mods for Minecraft & Roblox

We are constantly evolving and are always looking to improve. We would love for you to join our community, where you can meet other like-minded folks & get help getting started. 

Please find the Discord link on this page. See you there! :)

Step into a world where your streams are not just broadcasts but unforgettable experiences. With a suite of intuitive tools, you’ll design your streams your way:

HIBE STUDIO is packed with a wide range of customizable visual effects, including moods, props, auras, expressions, animations, gestures, & more! These effects can be triggered using hotkeys during your live streams to celebrate milestones, engage viewers, or simply add a fun touch to your content.


Experience life-like tracking using just a webcam with advanced customisable inputs for expression tracking & calibration & audio-based lip-sync, Hand & Body Tracking will be introduced later.



HIBE STUDIO has an inbuilt library for sound effects that give your streaming moments an added interactional layer. Soon we are coming up with UGC supported sounds library to personalize user streams.

name: HIBE STUDIO: Interactive Live Streaming For Gamers & Vtubers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570 3.2 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 3.3 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 6GB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Bring your avatar from Vroid, Live2D, or Vtube Studio into HIBE STUDIO and take your TikTok live streams to the next level! With interactive tools for Roblox, Minecraft, horror, and casual games, you’re all set to become the streamer of tomorrow. Dive in today!
